about_the_game:
The gods have unleashed this beast. Once bound to chains to restrain this creature from the outside world. The bound god can breath bursts of fire and swipe with its giant claws. It can bind and unbind itself at will to suit its need, between the unleashed full force of its powers, to a small agile form to dodge its enemies. The bound god comes with various new items to help it destroy everything in its path.

This DLC includes
The Bound God playable character
Tons of new collectable items to be found in your games
